means: 没有宗教信仰的，无宗教的，无信仰的

sentence.Network_en: The right attacks me for being irreligious.
sentence.Network_cn: 右翼分子抨击我没有宗教信仰。

sentence.Network_en: If you're a religious woman, give me a irreligious one!
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是也算得上虔诚的女人, 那就我一个不虔诚的给我看看!

sentence.Network_en: All human nature is divided asinto only two general sides, religious and irreligious.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有人类的天性也可以被分为两类, 即有信仰的与无信仰的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin irreligiosus, from in- 'not' + religiosus (see religious)

entry.tran: 无宗教信仰的;反对宗教的
entry.def: An irreligious person does not accept the beliefs of any religion or opposes all religions.

example.tran: 无宗教信仰的共产主义者

auth_sentence.content: The irreligious monarch...slept during the greater part of the sermon.
auth_sentence.res_content: The irreligious monarch...slept during the greater part of the sermon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The irreligious monarch...slept during the greater part of the sermon.

auth_sentence.content: She is drawn to the worldly ego, with its irreligious experiences and unforgivable sins.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is drawn to the worldly ego, with its irreligious experiences and unforgivable sins.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is drawn to the worldly ego, with its irreligious experiences and unforgivable sins.

auth_sentence.content: Irreligious or anti-religious as my left-wing friends often were, it seemed obvious that this hope was the mother of their hopes.
